content: have you always wanted to knit cables but been put off by charts and complicated-sounding stitches based on the sockalong 4ply basic sock this pattern is ideal for cable beginners and there is a photo and video tutorial to complement the pattern 08 02 17 the pattern has been updated to correct a couple of errors in the written cable block pattern and in the description of how to do the cables i ve said knitwise instead of purlwise if you have a copy of the pattern dated before 03 02 17 please download a new copy or update your existing one
